a.title: Click here in order to view the current regulations and forms for all atheltic sports in North Dakota.

li.a: North Dakota High Schools Actvities Association

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: x-large; color: crimson;

strong.a: Election Procedure for the 6/9/2020 School Board Election

h2.span: If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting Frank Egan, Technology Coordinator by e-mail at frank.egan@k12.nd.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act, you may contact our Section 504 coordinator, Pat Windish, K-12 Superintendent, at Maple Valley Public School, 207 Broadway. Tower City, ND. e-mail at pat.windish@k12.nd.us.
